thread.title: Ferne McCann 'embarrasses herself' with 'desperate bunny boiler' behaviour towards date on Celebs Go Dating
thread.title_full: Ferne McCann 'embarrasses herself' with 'desperate bunny boiler' behaviour towards date on Celebs Go Dating

author: Nicola Oakley
title: Ferne McCann 'embarrasses herself' with 'desperate bunny boiler' behaviour towards date on Celebs Go Dating
text:
Ferne McCann 'embarrasses herself' with 'desperate bunny boiler' behaviour towards date on Celebs Go Dating Viewers were cringing at the chat-up technique of the former TOWIE star and This Morning presenter Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Celebs Go Dating viewers are cringing at Ferne's chat-up style Share this video Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Celebs Go Dating is into its second week and only Jorgie Porter has managed to bag a second date, seemingly thanks to her laid-back approach. 
Fellow CGD star and former TOWIE regular Ferne McCann decided a rather different tactic to bag a date with hairdresser Lee on last night's show - and viewers were cringing. 
They took to Twitter to say Ferne was "embarrassing herself" with her "desperate" behaviour, calling her clingy and even accusing her of being a 'bunny boiler'. 
She spotted him at a drinks mixer and immediately liked the look of him, proclaiming he was the only man in the room she fancied at all. Ferne had that look of love when gazing into Lee's eyes (Photo: Channel 4) 
But she couldn't risk Jorgie Porter bagging a date with her crush, like last time, so she decided to get her claws into him quickly. 
How? By repeatedly telling him that she fancied him and that she loved his hair. 
And then there was "the Instagram incident". Ferne asked Lee if he had Instagram and then demanded to look at his account. She really fancied Lee (Photo: Channel 4) 
He somewhat nervously handed his phone over and she immediately began questioning who a woman was in one of his photos and why he had hashtagged it 'Always'. 
When Nadia came over to see what on Earth was going on - and tell her to chill out a bit - Ferne brandished the phone in her direction and told her Lee has "got a bird". 
But when he explained it was his ex and they broke up in September, she was back to telling him she fancied him again. She couldn't hide the joy from her face (Photo: Channel 4) 
Come on, Ferne, play it a bit more cool than that! 
With Ferne getting a talking-to from Nadia and his phone safely back in his hand, Lee widened his eyes at one of the other men at the mixer in surprise. 
But he couldn't have been put off, because he immediately snapped up a date with her when she offered. Lee had to show her his Instagram account (Photo: Channel 4) 
She was labelled a 'bunny boiler' on Twitter, in reference to the film Fatal Attraction where a spurned woman gets revenge on her lover. 
It didn't even end there. When Ferne reunited with dating experts Eden Blackman and Nadia Essex at the agency, she told them to get ready for her wedding and started claiming she was in love with Lee - despite the fact they haven't been on a date yet. 
She also insisted they had amazing chemistry and kept looking at each other from across the bar. 
Let's see how their date goes before we buy our hats. 
Celebs Go Dating returns tonight at 10pm on E4. Like us on Facebook
